overview: Daniel (25yo) is fired from his job as an air steward, just at the beginning of the Corona epidemic. He’s going back to living the single life of a gay Tel Avivian as an unemployed. At Purim party, he meets Idan (27yo), a well-known gay icon, a successful photographer, a bold guy who doesn’t mince words. They enter into a sort of undefined romantic relationship. In a new reality, when the entire economy and country is paralyzed, the world stops for a moment. The two men, confined together to one space, outside the race of life, have time to speak, reveal their skin and to flood out all the problems and concerns that they did not have to face until now.
title: New Era
